extDescription.message: A gentle companion that helps you stay focused on what matters

startFocusSession.description: Button to start a focus session

focusSessionPlaceholder.message: Choose a task or enter a goal...

focusingForHMS.description: Shows focus duration with hours, minutes, seconds

focusingForMS.description: Shows focus duration with minutes and seconds

focusingForS.description: Shows focus duration with seconds only

aiDescription.message: Enable AI-powered content analysis to detect when you drift away from your focus task. This feature uses local AI models and never sends your data to external servers.

standardNudgeBody1.message: Wait, that's just a distraction. Let's chase the real goal instead!

standardNudgeBody2.message: It's your focus! I found it over in the other tab. Wanna come get it?

standardNudgeBody3.message: I only get treats when you finish your tasks. Please? For me?

standardNudgeBody4.message: You are! Or... you will be, once we head back to our mission.

standardNudgeBody5.message: You dropped the ball on your task! It's okay, let's pick it up and keep going.

doomScrollNudgeBody1.message: I'm confused. I thought we were working on something else? Let's go back.

doomScrollNudgeTitle2.message: Is there a treat down here? ü¶¥

doomScrollNudgeBody2.message: You've been scrolling for a long time! I don't think the work is at the bottom of this page.

doomScrollNudgeBody3.message: This feed is endless, but our time isn't! Let's go fetch some productivity.

doomScrollNudgeBody4.message: I'm getting dizzy from all this scrolling. Can we go back to the important stuff?

doomScrollNudgeBody5.message: Just kidding. But now that I have your attention, stop scrolling and let's focus!

rapidSwitchNudgeBody1.message: You're clicking faster than I can wag my tail! Let's pick one task and stick to it.

rapidSwitchNudgeBody2.message: I smell distraction. You're jumping around a lot. Let's find the scent of our main project again.

rapidSwitchNudgeBody3.message: You're running all over the place! Sit. Stay. Focus on one tab.

rapidSwitchNudgeBody4.message: Too many tabs, too fast! Which one were we actually working on?

rapidSwitchNudgeBody5.message: Hey! Stop flickering around. Deep breath. One thing at a time.

stagnantTabNudgeBody1.message: We've been staring at this for a while. Is this related to work, or are we daydreaming?

stagnantTabNudgeBody2.message: This page looks interesting, but it doesn't look like our project. Let's swap back.

stagnantTabNudgeBody3.message: Let me out! We've been stuck on this off-topic page for ages. Back to work!

stagnantTabNudgeBody4.message: You haven't moved in a while. If we aren't working, can we go for a walk instead? Or just work.

stagnantTabNudgeBody5.message: I think you got lost in the internet rabbit hole. Grab my collar, I'll lead you back to work.

willCreateNewTask.message: ‚ú® Will be added as a new todo task
willCreateNewTask.description: Hint that a new todo will be created when starting focus

complete.description: Button to complete and end focus session

completeFocusSession.description: Tooltip for complete focus session button

relaunchChromeNote.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è After enabling, relaunch Chrome for changes to take effect.
relaunchChromeNote.description: Note about relaunching Chrome after enabling flags

withTab.description: Prefix text before showing current tab info

doomscrollingReason.message: You've been scrolling for a while. Looks like you might be doomscrolling.
doomscrollingReason.description: Reason shown when doomscrolling is detected

blacklistDescription.message: Sites on your blacklist will show a warning before you can access them. Use this to block distracting websites.

whitelistDescription.message: Sites on your whitelist will never trigger focus drift nudges. Use this for work-related sites.

blacklistWarningMessage.message: You've blocked this site to help you stay focused. Are you sure you want to visit?

blacklistWarningSubtext.message: This warning won't appear again for this tab

completedTodayMessage.description: Message showing how many tasks were completed today

focusTabAwayNudgeBody1.message: It's been a while! Your focus tab is getting lonely over there.

focusTabAwayNudgeBody2.message: You haven't checked on your work in a while. Ready to head back?

focusTabAwayNudgeBody3.message: Your focus tab is still waiting for you! Want to return to it?

focusTabAwayNudgeBody4.message: Hey! Remember that thing you were working on? It's still there!

focusTabAwayNudgeBody5.message: 10 minutes away from work... Want me to fetch your focus tab?

focusTabAwayReason.message: You've been away from your focus tab for 10 minutes.
focusTabAwayReason.description: Reason shown when user hasn't visited focus tab in 10 minutes
